data.description: Check an Australian Tax File Number (TFN)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Australian Tax File Numbers are a 9 digit number that can easily be
    entered incorrectly. This code calculates if it is a valid number by
    multiplying each value by a predefined weighting, dividing by 11 and
    checking the reaminter is 0.

    This allows web sites that require TFN input (eg: Accountants) to
    check that someone has not accidently entered two digits in reverse.
